Package main.java.elsim.models

Class RNG

java.lang.Object
main.java.elsim.models.RNG
public class RNG
extends java.lang.Object
A simple random number generator, to provide randomized values for different purposes throughout the simulation
Author:
ptomalak, fwagner

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static RNG getInstance()
      Static method to return the defined RNG instance
      Returns:
      RNG Instance of RNG class which was created

    • getSeed

      public int getSeed()
      Getter of seed
      Returns:
      seed Seed which is defined in the config to be used for the generator

    • getRandomInteger

      public int getRandomInteger​(int min, int max)
      Generates a random integer value between given boundaries
      Parameters:
      min - The minimal possible outcome of the randomization
      max - The maximal possible outcome of the randomization
      Returns:
      A random integer

    • getRandomIntegerExcept

      public int getRandomIntegerExcept​(int min, int max, int except)
      Generates a random integer value between given boundaries with the exception of a given number.
      Parameters:
      min - The minimal possible outcome of the randomization
      max - The maximal possible outcome of the randomization
      except - An integer which will be excluded from the possible return values.
      Returns:
      A random integer between the given boundaries except for the given number.

    • getRandomDouble

      public double getRandomDouble​(double min, double max, int decimals)
      Generates a random double value between given boundaries and rounds it to a given number of decimals
      Parameters:
      min - The minimal possible outcome of the randomization
      max - The maximal possible outcome of the randomization
      decimals - The amount of decimal places the result shall be rounded to
      Returns:
      A random double, rounded to the given decimal places
